column6: AN ENEMY RISES! And this time...IT'S PERSONAL. • The Shield is under siege! A Siege. In a book called "Siege." Does this count as a spoiler? • Things are looking bad for our crew on the Shield, and a "good" day involves everything trying to kill them, so... • Bizarre armories, viscous villains, unstrung heroes, and battles beyond reason. • Everyone's going to die. It's Awesome. Welcome to the Siege.
